Title
DevOps Engineer | SQL & NOSQL Admin
positions.description:
Project 1#
Architect, implement, and continuously improve CI/CD strategy that includes source code control, build pipelines, test automation, deployments, and the management of our documentation and process assets.
Using tools like Azure DevOps, validate requirements, deploy, and troubleshoot deployments of code and technologies in stage and production environments;
Experience with modern CI/CD tools (Jenkins).
Understanding of micro services architecture and experience in Kubernetes and Docker.
Used source-control tool Bit Bucket.
Building automated tools via Shell Scripting and Python.
Working experiences in interfacing with SOAP/REST APIs/ Web services.
Networking concepts (routes, subnets, ports, firewalls, etc.) and tools.
Security concepts and tools.
Performance monitoring and log management systems (Dynatrace, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack, etc.).Istio Implementation.
Project 2#
Administration of MongoDB databases throughout the development and production lifecycles.
Designing, Building, and automating the MongoDB Architecture.
OpsManager Setup and upgrade, monitor health via OpsManager.
Install, configure, and administer all Oracle databases (RAC) required for development, testing, Staging & Production.
Performs Capacity planning, Performance Tuning of Oracle databases.
Develop and implement backup and recovery policies and processes. Ensure the integrity of backups and perform testing of necessary recovery operations.
Develop and implement database security policies, procedures and processes including access, logging and monitoring.Oracle & MongoDB Performance Tuning.
Install Golden Gate Veridata and set up environments for monitoring.
Setup Uni or Bi-Directional Golden Gate and develop the mapping as per the requirement.
Setup cross table mappings as per business requirements using Golden Gate.
Used Advanced Golden Gate skills for cross mapping between the tables.
Involved in outages and Provide 24 X 7 support for MongoDB and Oracle databases.
